translations.translation: and sons who stay with him,
And sons always present by his side,
and sons ever present with him,
and children living in his presence,
And gave him sons present before him.
And children attending.
And sons dwelling in his presence,
and sons standing before him,
And sons abiding in his presence
and sons to be by his side,
And sons present by his side.
[gave him] sons to be at his side,
And sons to be by his side!-
And children to be by his side!
and sons that stand in witness.
And children as witnesses.
And children present [with him]
[74:13] and sons, ten or more, present [by his side], present at social gatherings and whose testimonies are listened to,
(And sons abiding in his presence) never out of his sight. He had ten sons.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَبَنِينَ شُهُوداً } أي حضوراً قال كانوا عشرةً ويقال: ثلاثةُ عَشر

translations.translation: And His saying, "And the sons {as witnesses}" - that is, present - said: "They were thirteen."

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَبَنِينَ شُهُوداً } [المدثر: 13] حضوراً معه دائماً، لا ينفصلون عنه زماناً؛ لاستغنائهم عن التجارة والحراثة وسائر المصالح؛ لكثرة خدمهم وحشمهم، بحيث لا احتياج لهم من تهيئة أسبابهم إلى ترددهم بأنفسهم؛ لذلك يحضرون معه في جميع المحافل والمجالس، والأندية تكميلاً لثروته ووجاهته
